mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_GRADE, DATE_FORMAT(MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, '%Y년%m월%d일') AS MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL, DATE_FORMAT(MEMBER_DEL_DATE, '%Y년%m월%d일') AS MEMBER_DEL_DATE, MEMBER_SOCIAL, MEMBER_POINT, MEMBER_TOTALPAY, MEMBER_NOT, REFUND_NAME, REFUND_BANK, REFUND_ACCOUNT FROM `member` WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId};
